title: UPDATED: UCI Says That Van der Poel Bunny-Hop at Zürich Worlds Didn’t Warrant Penalty
content:
The UCI responds to a protest from the Latvian cycling federation and clarifies that MVDP's quick bounce onto the sidewalk did not warrant sanction or disqualification.

Read the full article at UPDATED: UCI Says That Van der Poel Bunny-Hop at Zürich Worlds Didn’t Warrant Penalty on Velo.
author: ahood
